path.label: File Path
path.helpText: The file (and folder) path to which to save (<italic>e.g.</italic>, french/basque/SaintSauveur.xml).

createRepoForm.heading: Create Repository
createRepoForm.wouldYouLikeToCreate: This repository does not exist yet, would you like to create it?

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: A short description of your repository.
description.helpText: The description will appear on the GitHub page for your new repository.

forkRepoForm.heading: Fork Repository and Submit Pull Request to Original Repository
forkRepoForm.hasPermission: You have the ability to create a Pull Request to this repository, but you do not own it. Your proposed changes may be rejected by the repository owner(s). If you would like to preserve the changes you've made to this version of this file, we recommend you make a copy (fork) of the  original repository and create a Pull Request with your changes to the original repository
forkRepoForm.noPermission: You do not have permission to use this repository: "{{repo}}". Try saving to another repository or fork the repository and make a pull request.

createFile.heading: Create File
createFile.body: This file doesn't exist yet, would you like to create it?

overwrite.heading: File Found
overwrite.body: This file exists - would you like to overwrite it?

error.repoNoPermission: You do not have writing permissions for the selected repository.
error.repoNotExist: The repository {{repo}} you are trying to save the file to does not exist.
error.repoNotExistForPR: The repository you are trying to create a Pull Request to does not exist
error.notAuthorizeCreateForOtherUser: You cannot create a new repository inside another user's account.
error.notOrgMemberCreate: You must be a member of {{owner}} organization to create a repository on their behalf.
error.ownerNotExist: The repository owner {{owner}} you selected does not exist.
